kummins.maths

Class DecimalRounder

  • java.lang.Object
    • kummins.maths.DecimalRounder

  • public class DecimalRounder
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a means to round a double of float number to a set number of decimal places.
    Author:
    Chris Cummins

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DecimalRounder(int p)
      Creates a decimal rounder with a decimal point accuracy equal to the argument.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDecimalPlaces()
      Returns the decimal place accuracy of the rounder.
      double round(double d)
      Returns the argument rounded to the specified accuracy.
      double round(float f)
      Returns the argument rounded to the specified accuracy.
      void setDecimalPlaces(int p)
      Set a new decimal places accuracy.
